title: 09/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin prepares for the kickoff of the 2021 NFL season by discussing the Cowboys v Buccaneers game and why he has difficulty labeling Dak Prescott an elite quarterback. He explains why Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa not being named captain for the season is reason for concern. He shares the 2 teams in the NFL who have disappointed despite having future hall of famers in their prime. Plus, Hall of Famer Jimmy Johnson joins the show to talk about Dak's return after last season's devastating injury.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
